com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate.placement

Interface RuleFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttributeRuleFactory, HostnameRuleFactory, RegionRuleFactory, ZoneRuleFactory

    public interface RuleFactory
    This interface defines the requirements for a factory which generates PlacementRules.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default PlacementRule avoid(java.util.Collection<StringMatcher> matchers)
      Requires that a task NOT be placed on any of the provided string matchers.
